articles.author: Mike Wall
articles.title: SpaceX launches advanced European weather satellite, lands rocket at sea (photos) - Space
articles.description: Liftoff of the MTG-S1 mission occurred today (July 1) at 5:04 p.m. ET.
articles.content:
A SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket just launched an advanced European weather satellite and aced its landing on a ship at sea.
The Falcon 9 lifted off from historic Pad 39A at NASA's Kennedy Space Center in F… [+3630 chars]

articles.title: Spain and England record hottest June as heatwave grips Europe - BBC
articles.description: Several European regions had their highest temperatures on the last day of June, as a heatwave continues into July.
articles.content:
Thomas Mackintosh
A woman fans herself during the June heatwave in Madrid
Spain and England have recorded their hottest June ever, as scorching temperatures continue to grip Europe.
